segments.text: The kitchen looks warm with daylight from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, showing the neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's calmly drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems content in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh my, the faucet's left on and overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out in a sheet, wetting everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading; it's gross how it's just sitting there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in itâ€”slippery hazard ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, grabbing cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, the stool leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperating, waiting with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can't shake the worry of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness from the adult is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene mixes joy and peril so oddly.
segments.speaker: PAR
